name: HSLuv

values.name: hsluv
values.comment:
`hsluv` create a Color with normalized HSLuv
components (0->1) and an alpha channel
values.type: { hue : Basics.Float, saturation : Basics.Float, lightness : Basics.Float, alpha : Basics.Float } -> HSLuv.Color

values.name: hsluv360
values.comment:
`hsluv360` create a Color with HSLuv
components and an alpha channel

    - hue range is 0->360
    - saturation range is 0->100
    - lightness range is 0->100
    - alpha range is 0->1
values.type: { hue : Basics.Float, saturation : Basics.Float, lightness : Basics.Float, alpha : Basics.Float } -> HSLuv.Color

values.name: rgb
values.comment:
`rgb` create a Color with normalized RGB components (0->1)
and an alpha channel
values.type: { red : Basics.Float, green : Basics.Float, blue : Basics.Float, alpha : Basics.Float } -> HSLuv.Color

values.name: rgb255
values.comment: `rgb255` create a Color with RGB components (0->255) and an alpha channel (0->1)
values.type: { red : Basics.Int, green : Basics.Int, blue : Basics.Int, alpha : Basics.Float } -> HSLuv.Color

values.name: toHsluv
values.comment: `toHsluv` extract the normalized components of a color in the HSLuv format
values.type: HSLuv.Color -> { hue : Basics.Float, saturation : Basics.Float, lightness : Basics.Float, alpha : Basics.Float }

values.name: toHsluv360
values.comment:
`toHsluv360` extract the components of a color in the HSLuv format

    - hue range is 0->360
    - saturation range is 0->100
    - lightness range is 0->100
    - alpha range is 0->1
values.type: HSLuv.Color -> { hue : Basics.Float, saturation : Basics.Float, lightness : Basics.Float, alpha : Basics.Float }

values.name: toRgb
values.comment: `toRgb` extract the normalized components of a color in the RGBA format
values.type: HSLuv.Color -> { red : Basics.Float, green : Basics.Float, blue : Basics.Float, alpha : Basics.Float }

values.name: toRgb255
values.comment: `toRgb255` extract the components of a color in the RGBA format (0->255)
values.type: HSLuv.Color -> { red : Basics.Int, green : Basics.Int, blue : Basics.Int, alpha : Basics.Float }
